dmca.title: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - Case#: 40013
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 23, 2004 1:16 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - Case#: 400131 - 1st Notice

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: markg@bigresources.com <markg@bigresources.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Thursday, December 23, 2004, 12:16:23 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - Case#: 400131 - 1st Notice

===8<==============Original message text===============
Thursday, December 23, 2004

I am an authorized representative of Big Resources, Inc., which represents
the intellectual property interests of http://www.BoxedArt.com, a web
graphics online shop.

Big Resources, Inc., is providing this letter of notification pursuant to
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act and 17 USC § 512 (c), which applicable
internationally as well, to make you aware of material that materials have
been placed on a website, http://www.realfrontpage.com, that infringes Big
Resources, Inc's exclusive copyright rights.  This notice serves as demand
for immediate removal of all infringing material illegally distributed
through the http://www.realfrontpage.com website which was obtained through
boxedart.com.  All products, as well as the product category icons, on this
website were pirated from http://www.boxedart.com, and this site must be
removed from service within 48 hours.

All of BoxedArt templates are designed by an inhouse staff, and Big
Resources Inc., holds full copyright to these items, and does not allow
distribution of its work in any form.

All templates, graphics, materials, and product descriptions on this site
that were acquired illegally and and may not be distributed.

Any contents of such graphic products, or product descriptions, are herein
after referred to as "Infringing Material".  Based on the information at its
disposal on 12/23/2004 1:20 PM EST, Big Resources, Inc., believes that the
statements in this notice are accurate and correctly describe the infringing
nature and status of the Infringing Material.

Accordingly, Big Resources, Inc. hereby notifies that:

Host Website:

theplanet.com

must immediately remove or disable access to the Infringing Material at the
web addresses identified above. Thank you in advanced for your timely
cooperation on this matter.

Regards,

Mark Greenberg
Big Resources, Inc.

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFByxmGvK/XpJs6oyURAoN5AJ41kQkuHOskwBGsfiZzZCTucDWDCwCdFEdX
pISZNLG246FT0miVExrrZMY=
=UKhp
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
